description: This file is a shell script used to start and stop the Home Security HNAP process, specifically for the 'ccsphs' service. It handles service initialization, start, stop, restart commands, and manages IPv4 status events. The script sources other utility scripts and manages service states using system events and process control commands.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Starts the Home Security service if the network is up and the service isn't already started.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Stops the Home Security service by killing its process and updating status.

methods.name: handle_ipv4_status
methods.description: Handles IPv4 status changes, triggering start or stop of the service based on network status.
